contents.text:
Business branding

Branding is one of the most important aspects of any business, large or small, retail or B2B. An effective brand strategy gives you a major edge in increasingly competitive markets. But what exactly does "branding" mean? How does it affect a small business like yours?

This page let you to set business branding information such as title, logo and etc.
contents.name: HTML text

contents.text:
Title

A title is an attribute that specifies the title of a web page. Titles are displayed on search engine results pages (SERPs) as the clickable headline for a given result, and are important for usability, SEO, and social sharing. The title tag of a web page is meant to be an accurate and concise description of a page's content. Read more...

Example:
contents.name: HTML text

contents.text:
Description

Description is an attributes that provide concise summaries of webpages. They are between one sentence to a short paragraph and appear underneath the blue clickable links in a search engine results page (SERP). Read more ...

Example:
contents.name: HTML text

contents.text:
Keywords

Specifies a comma-separated list of keywords - relevant to the page (Informs search engines what the page is about).
contents.name: HTML text

contents.text:
Logo

It defines an image to use as logo of the site.
contents.name: HTML text

contents.text:
Favicon

Favicon is the shortcut from the Favorites icon.

It is a small logo found in front of the visited URL, it can be seen in Address Bar, and is used to promote a company or a trademark

A favicon must have the following characteristics.

  • name - favicon.ico
  • size - 32x32 or 16x16 pixels
  • Color - 265
